about_the_game:
Alone, a hunter battles nightmares in the dead of night when he suddenly awakens. Seeing a glow outside his home, he steps out and finds a deer before him. As the deer starts to run away, he fires his gun. Missing the first shot, the hunter begins to chase the deer. After a long pursuit, he catches up and shoots it, but the deer rises again. This time, as he turns around, he finds himself face-to-face with a terrifying monster. In a panic, he attacks the creature, only to be killed in the struggle. Suddenly, he opens his eyes and finds himself in bed. He realizes it was all a dream, yet the line between dream and reality remains blurred.

We are excited to announce that Folk Tales: Ala Geyik will be supported with regular updates, continually bringing new content to players. Each update will be carefully crafted to add fresh excitement to your experience. With brand-new content, characters, maps, and weapons, your gameplay will always feel renewed. Based on feedback from our community, we aim to make the game even more engaging and to offer you even more choices.

Equipped with the revolutionary visual technologies offered by Unreal Engine 5, our game will immerse players in a work of art, featuring detailed graphics, realistic lighting, and stunning visual effects. Additionally, thanks to Unreal Engine 5's exceptional performance, our game will deliver a smooth gaming experience that pushes the boundaries of hardware

  • NVIDIA RTX™ (DLSS)

  • AMD FidelityFX™ (FSR)

  • Intel XeSS (Xe Super Sampling)

Its technology promises higher graphic settings and an uninterrupted gaming experience, ensuring optimization without sacrificing visual quality.

Take advantage of NVIDIA Reflex’s low-latency technology for smoother gameplay. Escape nightmares with quicker reactions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-7600K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3700X or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Folk Tales: Ala Geyik is an action-horror game. It follows a hunter who, after experiencing a nightmare, is chased by a deer he has repeatedly killed. As supernatural events unfold, he must face the Ala Geyik in a night filled with haunting nightmares and his struggle for survival.
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Greek
